about_the_game:
Are you ready for an action horror game that will give your soul different tensions?

Your goal is to defeat the Killer by destroying his inspired objects.
The murderer will subject you to different tortures. Rescue your friends using secrecy and hiding.
Eliminate the Killer by racing against the clock to find hidden items.

In the game you have a choice as a killer or a survivor.

What awaits you if you are a murderer:

Playing the game as a killer gives you additional abilities in-game.
The killer harms the survivors, puts them on torture tables and leaves them to die.
But no, killing them doesn't keep them out of the game.
Those who die in the game continue to help the survivors (as spirits);

After death, the game only offers you the task of carrying Fire.
You have to carry fire to your surviving friends. (Good lucks)

What awaits the Survivors in the game;

The killer takes his power from the scarecrows and the only way to destroy it is to destroy them by setting the scarecrows on fire.

Every scarecrow destroyed weakens the killer.
If a total of 5 Scarecrows are destroyed, the survivors win the game.


death is just the beginning.




Your torch has an important place in Brink of Death.
And you need to make good use of your Resources.
And remember, you have plenty of safe places to hide.







Brink of Death content is an asymmetrical horror survival game with unique gameplay.

content_descriptors.notes:
There are some limb amputation and blood effects in the game.
Brink of death is a game in which the survivors are sentenced to death with torture instruments.
Players are subjected to different torture devices by the AI, and sometimes their limbs are amputated or hanged in a specific area.

short_description: It is a Co-Op horror game that can be played with at least 1 and at most 4 players on the Brink of Death. Your goal is to defeat the killer doctor who feeds on fear in the cursed area. You'll need a lot of things, but don't stop destroying the scarecrows it draws on. Death is just the beginning.
